title: Few-Shot Learning: Teach AI by Example
description: Master the art of teaching AI through examples - learn to craft prompts that show, don't tell.
description_cs: Ovládněte umění učit AI pomocí příkladů - naučte se vytvářet prompty, které ukazují místo vysvětlování.
learning_objectives: Understand the difference between zero-shot, one-shot, and few-shot learning
Structure effective few-shot prompts with clear formatting
Apply few-shot learning to classification, format conversion, and style transfer
Know when few-shot helps and when it fails
Combine few-shot with Chain-of-Thought for complex tasks
